net.tasmod.random

Class SimpleRandomMod

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • net.tasmod.random.SimpleRandomMod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleRandomMod
extends java.util.Random
    Hijacked Random, that uses a global seed THIS FILE IS NOT IN THE FINAL VERSION AND IS JUST FOR TESTING TODO, RECORD THE SEED AND MAKE IT RANDOM PER ENTITY
